text:
Saya stay di kamar 824 tgl 20-25/6/19. Hotel baru yg cukup bagus dan kebetulan dekat rumah orang tua sya sehingga sya stay dsni. Ada bbrpa hal yg sbenarnya mau sya berikan masukan saat sya masih stay kemarin, tapi sya tidak yakin mana orang yg tepat utk sya berikan informasi pengalaman saat sya stay karena staff hotel spertinya lebih fokus ke tamu yg berpakaian rapi dan formal karena sya stay berbarengan dgn salah satu lembaga pemilu, dibandingkan yg berpakaian santai sperti saya saat disana. Basic thing dlm sebuah hotel adalah mengenai safety n security. Di tgl 21/06 jam 5 pagi, tanpa alasan yg jelas salah satu staff hotel (dia menyebutkan indentitas department HK) mengetuk pintu kamar saya dan membuka dgn kasar kamar sya tersebut (untungnya kamar selalu sya double locked dari dalam) di saat saya sedang istirahat dgn anak n istri sya. Hal yg lucu adalah padahal sya memasang tanda Do Not Disturb n kenapa dy nekat tetap membuka kamar sya tsb. Saat dia tau ada suara sya dari dalam kamar, dy pergi bgitu saja tanpa penjelasan atau kata maaf karena sya sempat keluar dan melihat staff tersebut sudah jalan sampai diujung sisi lain dari koridor kamar sya. Saat itu jg sya lgsg telp ke petugas FO n menceritakan hal ini. Tetapi sampai sya checked out, seperti tidak ada follow up karena tidak ada informasi balik ke sya ataupun permintaan maaf dari management (dalam hal ini bukan kompensasi yang sya minta, hanya komunikasi agar tamu tau pihak hotel benar2 serius menanggapi setiap keluhan dari tamu apalagi kasus sperti ini). Hal itu jg yg membuat sya berfikir mgkn akan percuma klo sya memberikan masukan panjang lebar ke org yg tidak tepat karena akan useless atau mungkin sya yang harus mengerti beda kelas hotel beda jg kualitasnya (tapi yg jelas Safety n Security is a basic thing di hotel karena pasti ada SOP yg harus diikuti oleh semua staff). Sejak kejadian itu, istri sya takut setiap sya tinggal sndrian di kamar karena kebetulan letak kamar sya itu ada di paling ujung koridor sebelah gudang yg hampir selalu berisik setiap ada staff yg meletakkan barang atau lainnya. Sya sudah stay di banyak hotel baik bintang 3 sampai 5 dan sangat toleran n mengerti dgn operasional hotel luar n dalam, dan baru kali ini mengalami hal sperti ini dan sperti tidak ada tindak lanjutnya sehingga memancing sya utk pertama kalinya memberikan review secara online. Horison hotel yg cukup bagus, tapi bnyak hal yg perlu di improve sebagai hotel baru dan sya dengan senang hati memberikan review mulai dari saat sya checked in n checked out dgn review yang bijak. Nice smile saat greetings sekarang tidak cukup utk bisa memenangkan hati tamu di persaingan hotel yang semakin ketat, but your quality and the way of you to solve a problems yg akan dinilai oleh tamu.
Terima Kasih
title: Nice Hotel but need a lot of Improvements

text: This is a clean and nice hotel, located a bit far from Simpang Lima Semarang. The room is nice, with hot water flowing, no smoking odor room, and cool AC.  However the hotel reservation system through the MyHorison website, needs more improvement.  When I made a reservation through the MyHorison website, I didn't receive a confirmation number through my email, but only three lines messages confirming that I have successfully make the reservation (without mentioning the confirmation number) and a suggestion to contact a whatsapp number if I hadn't receive another email confirming my payment after 30 minutes.  Waited for more than 30 mins, I didn't receive the confirmation number, then I contacted the whatsapp number plus whatsapp number of this specific hotel. They need hours to send me my room reservation confirmation number, and when they finally did, the confirmation showed my reservation was "unpaid" (while actually I did pay the room using my credit card).  On the check-in date, I gave the print out of the short email and the room confirmation with unpaid status to the receptionist. She took picture of those papers, and asked for a certain number from me, which I didn't have, so I gave her an sms message from my credit card that showed I have paid the transaction.  She took picture of my sms from my mobile phone and finalized the process, and gave me the key to my room.  From this story you can learn that the reservation process until I got my room was very very painful and stressful.  This hotel definitely has to learn from other hotel on how to upgrade their technology for their painless reservation process.
title: Need improvement in reservation technology
